title: Mac client bug
body:
Every time I connect to a game and get through shame select then I'm in loading screen and it won't let me connect and I get this pop up.

'atos needs to take control  of another process for debugging to continue. Type the name and password of a user in the "Developer Tools" group to allow this.'

Help anyone?
Thanks.

replies.body:
>shame select

Now select your preferred method of shame. 

* SHAME ON YOU
* SHAME ON ME
* UNALTERED SHAME
* PITIFUL SHAME

lol

Could you get a screen-shot of that?
Update I have entered name and password for this but now (i'm testing by spectating) I just get bugs plat errors
